text: Va zanhoe, ki ʙa saʙaʙi kalonsoliason az didani hajz noumed sudand, agar dar suʙha aftoded, ki idaason ci qadar ʙosad? Pas ʙidoned, ki iddaason guzastani se moh ast. Va zanhoe, ki ʙa sinni hajz didan narasidaand, iddai onho niz se moh ast. Va iddai zanhoi homilador, vaz'i haml (tavallud) ast. Va har ki az Alloh ʙitarsad va hukmhoi Uro ʙa coj orad, Alloh korasro dar dunjovu oxirat oson xohad kard
